roleset.name: to ride in a balloon
roleset.note: BALLOON-V NOTES: Frames file for 'balloon' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from balloon.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: They will also tell you that even if you hate heights , you can still balloon .

roleset.name: to increase or cause to increase
roleset.note: BALLOON-V NOTES: Frames file for 'balloon' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from balloon.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: A bloated payroll and pervasive graft caused Pemex 's operating costs to balloon to 95 cents of each $ 1 [*U*] in sales , far above the industry norm .
example.arg: to 95 cents of each $ 1 [*U*] in sales , far above the industry norm
